definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs
Great Sword Society, an offshoot of the White Lotus in the late Qing dynasty, involved in anti-Western activity at the time of the Boxer rebellion
lit. to wield the broadsword in the presence of Lord Guan (idiom)/fig. to make a fool of oneself by showing off in front of an expert
pinyin: Guan1 gong1 mian4 qian2 shua3 da4 dao1

sentences.english: Catching each other's eyes glinting in the night, they held their cane knives and machetes with tight fists.
sentences.chinese: 每个人的眼里都闪着光芒，双拳紧握甘蔗刀和大刀。

sentences.english: He would slay the system, like the Terminator.
sentences.chinese: 他会像终结者那样大刀阔斧改革不正常的机制。

sentences.english: A shiny broadsword is hanging on the wall.
sentences.chinese: 一把金煌煌的大刀挂在墙上。

sentences.english: It felt like a large chef's knife had been stuck in my back, " Goldfarb says.
sentences.chinese: 就像一把厨师的大刀扎进我的后背，”戈德法布说。

sentences.english: Play a big knife before GuanGong.
Burdened with no fardel of the past, he has boldly taken the initiative.
sentences.chinese: 但是他无历史包袱，以大刀阔斧决断争取主动。

sentences.english: They hired locals to hack through the brush with machetes .
sentences.chinese: 于是雇用当地人用大刀砍出一条穿越树丛的路。

sentences.english: He keeps his machete gripped tightly.
He knows voters are clamoring for decisive action to stop the country's slide into economic malaise.
sentences.chinese: 他知道选民要求政府采取大刀阔斧的行动挽救经济。

sentences.english: As the so-called Qi's Dao we see can not be said to be Tang broadsword .
sentences.chinese: 正如我们看见所谓的戚家刀不能就说是唐大刀一样。

sentences.english: But the heavy hand of the government can be stifling here.
sentences.chinese: 但是政府这种大刀阔斧的做法可能会适得其反。

sentences.english: You don't need to take huge steps, just smalls.
sentences.chinese: 你不必要大刀阔斧，只是需要平时小小的投资。
国会大刀阔斧地削减预算。

sentences.english: Broadsword family descendant JiZhao was xuantong emperor queen bodyguard.
sentences.chinese: 大刀世家传人齐昭曾是宣统皇帝御前侍卫。

sentences.english: Instead, Mr Razaleigh's candidacy was quashed by party chiefs.
sentences.chinese: 但是政党首领却大刀阔斧，削去了拉沙理的候选资格。

definition: halberd/long-handled weapon with pointed tip and crescent blade/combined spear and battle-ax
ancient spear-like weapon with a wavy spearhead like a snake's body
ancient spear-like weapon 18 Chinese feet 尺[chi3] in length, with a wavy spearhead like a snake's body,
